Dialogue: Ok!

Speaker: Ross

Speaker: Chandler
Dialogue: Oh, that's not true. You had an impact on me, I mean, it's 15 years later and we're still best friends. Doesn't that count for something?

Dialogue: Yeah... Oh, great. More party boys for Chandler!

Speaker: Chandler
Dialogue: I'm sure it's somebody for you. Now, go hide.

Dialogue: You are married though.

Speaker: Chandler
Dialogue: I'm sure that would mean a lot to him. And if heaven has a door, I'm sure he's pressing his ear up against it and listening intently.

Dialogue: I thought so many times about calling him and asking him out. I guess I really missed my chance.

Speaker: Ross
Dialogue: But you didn't! I'm still alive!! Kori, I know this is a big surprise for you. It's a long story but the things you just said really made my day! I mean, the fact that you are here means more to me than if this room were filled with people!

Speaker: Kori
Dialogue: You sick freak, who does that? I can't believe I had a crush on you!

Speaker: Ross
Dialogue: Did you hear that? Kori Weston had a crush on me!! Ending Credits

Speaker: Ross
Dialogue: No Mum, I'm not dead. I know it's not something to kid about. It was just a practical joke between Chandler and me, but it's over, ok? Actually no, even if I had died, you would not be left childless. Monica? Friends Greatest Sitcom
